text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
A one and a two! One and a two!<n>Warm-ups fully up
warmed!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Nothing better before a treasure hunt<n>than warming up! Go
on, you, get to<n>stretching!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A strange place, an even stranger<n>Umamusume, and a
treasure hunt... I<n>can't wrap my head around what's<n>
happening.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Really though, are you even listening?<n>Hello? Hel-lo?
Helloooo?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ring ring, ring ring. ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for calling. This is Golshi's<n>Ask Me Anything
hotline.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Is your problem one of continental<n>scale? Global scale? Or
even cosmic<n>scale?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Customers calling with a question<n>today will receive our
grand double<n>conundrum prize! ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey now, I'm offering cosmic<n>solutions and all you think to
ask<n>about is your measly little personal<n>problem?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You're hopeless. How's this? In the<n>name of goodwill, I'll
answer you that<n>one for free.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Listen up—we crossed the wild trails<n>of the mountains
beyond Tracen,<n>escaped the narrowest of caves, and<n>
made it through perilous jungles to<n>get here...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: In other words... we're somewhere<n>on Earth.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh please, no need to panic! I don't<n>really remember where,
but it's Earth,<n>so we'll make it back someday!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I need you to focus. You doremember why we're here, don'tyou?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: A reminder then—there's apriceless treasure waiting for us.Something that'll make me theundisputable, most powerfulUmamusume ever.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: We came all the way here to get it.And you're gonna help me find it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Sooo, let's start this treasure hunt! ♪<n>Cue the fanfare! You
better tell me as<n>soon as you unearth the goods!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I can grasp the situation, I'm<n>forced into joining this
treasure hunt<n>of hers...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several hours later...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ohh! What's this old, beat-up canoe<n>doing here?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wowiiie! Check out those holes! A<n>boat like this'll leak for
sure! I bet it'd<n>sink us real fast!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And what do we have here... That's<n>the stuff! Nothing says
treasure like<n>moldy boots!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Sniff, sniff...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, that sweet fishy aroma... Like a<n>tuna troller of old...
Really takes me<n>back to my days fishing on the open<n>
seas...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wait, what the heck am I doing?! No<n>time to wallow in
nostalgic bliss! Find<n>that treasure already!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's been worked up like this since<n>we got here. What
exactly could she<n>be searching for?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huh? What're you looking at mefor?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I think I know. ☆ You must've<n>fallen head over heels for
my beauty.<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I know it must be difficult... But you<n>mustn't stare.<n>
That—would—be—naughty. ☆
choice_data_list:
Um, actually, I wanted to ask what we're
looking for.

Um, actually, I wanted to ask what we're
looking for.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Don't you know treasure? Obvs it'll<n>be all sparkly. Don't
think. Feeeel.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Now I have even less of a clue... I<n>guess I'll just start
looking over<n>there.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I walk over to some palm trees and<n>notice a coconut that's
fallen to the<n>ground.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
For-ward! For-ward! Onward we go! ♪<n>Come on out, come
on out, tricky little<n>treasure! ♪
choice_data_list: Uh, I found a coconut... How's that?
Uh, I found a coconut... How's that?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whoa... WHOOOAAA!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Th-that's... the super healing fruit of<n>the tropical realms! Are
you some<n>kinda genius or what?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Yah-hooo! ♪ That's the treasure I've<n>been looking for!
Careful now, just<n>lay it on the ground!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I thought it was a long shot, but I<n>guess this is really what
Gold Ship<n>wanted.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I place the coconut on the ground as<n>instructed.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
...All right. Now retreat to safety.<n>What's about to happen is
far too<n>dangerous for a mere mortal.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Inhale...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wataaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whack! Crack!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She cracks open the rock-hardcoconut with her bare hands! Youneed to be fearless and havetremendous strength to do that!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Phew... Hehe, split it right down the<n>middle.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Now's about the time for a little<n>break. Go ahead, take a
seat, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: With little else to do on this desertedbeach, I accept my coconut half and sitdown on some driftwood... To be continued
